news.title: It's not just the 'yuck factor' that puts people off eating insects
news.summary: There’s a lot of hype around edible insects. Insects are being championed as a healthy and sustainable alternative to conventional protein sources in Europe and the US, and “ento-prising” new products are appearing almost every week.

news.title: It’s not just the ‘yuck factor’ that puts people off eating insects
news.summary: There’s a lot of hype around edible insects. Insects are being championed as a healthy and sustainable alternative to conventional protein sources in Europe and the US, and “ento-prising” new products are appearing almost every week.

news.title: Sure, Insects Are Icky. But the Real Reason We Don’t Eat Them Is Because They’re Not Convenient.
news.summary: Maybe the real reason we don’t eat them is because they’re not convenient. MauMyHaT/Thinkstock This story originally appeared on the Conversation and is reproduced here with permission.

news.title: Insect burgers, cricket cocktails, anyone? Tips for ento-prising entrepreneurs
news.summary: There's huge money to be made in getting the west to eat insect burgers, drink cricket cocktails and generally shake off the insect "yuck factor": expert.

news.title: Insect burgers, cricket cocktails, anyone? Tips for ento-prising entrepreneurs
news.summary: I fall into that camp of squeamish eaters: I’d never dream of chomping on an insect burger or sipping a cricket cocktail.
